name: Flip Warriors
description:
NOTE: i rushed this near the end so it might have some random bugs but it should mostly work!! i will be uploading a fixed version if there are bug reports so please lemme know ofc!! its a jam game, very short and not very full of things to explore, but i hope you appreciate my try.

NOTE 2: THERE IS NO SOUND!!! i didnt have time hehe

CONTROLS:

wasd / arrow keys = directions, move and such

x or numpad 3 = "confirm", A button

z or numpad 2 = "cancel", B button

welcome to the world of Flip Warriors!!! a traditional JRPG experience... 

Story: you are a Flip Warrior, you have a switch on you. your hp = the number of flips you have left on your switch. you can choose which flip side is which class. it's very cute. enemy behavior (on the boss at least) will cahnge depending on their switch's current flip status. yours will too. this is the world... of flipping.

CLASSES

GEEK - repair, heal, and study

VAMPIRE - bite!

WEREWOLF - grrr!!!!

ROBOT - very tough, but slow!
